name: Additive respiratory depression
actions: Avoid combining respiratory depressants when possible.
If unavoidable, use the lowest effective doses and monitor closely for respiratory depression (educational).

rationale: Combined respiratory depressant effects increase overdose risk.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both can cause respiratory depression. Combined use can increase overdose risk, especially with higher doses or additional CNS depressants (educational).
